name: Fusion Relics - Alpha Test Release - Cinderwing Games
name_original: Fusion Relics - Alpha Test Release - Cinderwing Games
description:
We are a Husband and Wife Indie Game Developer team, called Cinderwing Games! We have 2 kids and 2 full time jobs, so we usually work on games between 9pm and 2am every day! It's hard, but it has been our dream to be Indie Game Developers for the last 6 years and we will make it happen!

We greatly appreciate your support and love receiving feedback that helps us shape our game!

FUSION RELICS: a 2D side-scrolling, creature collector, RPG platformer with arcade hack and slash mechanics, hand drawn art, and character customization, where you battle giant titans, hatch creatures, and restore the balance between Light and Dark to a corrupted world!

We would love your feedback while playing this ALPHA Test Release! Please help us make this game better by joining our email list on our website: where you will get early access, a community discord chat, and to share input!  Thank you!  www.fusionrelics.com

If you would like to be one of the first to WISHLIST this game and show your support while it's in early production, please follow the link below! Thank you so much! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1608130/Fusion_Relics/
